name: Eiffel Grand Hotel
description: Wake up to views of the Eiffel Tower in this elegant 4-star hotel. Romantic, central, and full of Parisian charm.

name: Le Marais Boutique
description: Hidden in the artsy Le Marais district, this hotel mixes old-world elegance with a modern twist. Très chic and very walkable.

name: Montmartre Nest
description: Cozy and creative hideaway near Sacré-Cœur. Perfect for travelers who want cafés, cobblestones, and inspiration.

name: Seine View Suites
description: Modern comfort meets riverfront elegance. Enjoy life by the Seine in style, just a stroll from Notre-Dame.

name: Latin Quarter Hotel
description: A friendly hotel in the heart of Paris’s academic and bohemian soul. Steps from bookshops, cafés, and charm.

name: Louvre Luxe Stay
description: Sleep next to masterpieces. This hotel is ideal for museum lovers and shoppers looking for a five-star spot.

name: Opéra Garnier Hotel
description: A grand and glamorous address near Paris’s famous opera house. Great for elegant nights and shopping days.

name: Champs-Élysées Retreat
description: Tucked behind the world’s most famous avenue, this tranquil stay gives you shopping and silence in one.

name: Bastille City Lodge
description: Affordable and stylish. A youthful stay surrounded by nightlife, culture, and classic brasseries.

name: Left Bank Haven
description: Literary vibes, vintage cafés, and riverside romance – this hotel wraps up the classic Paris experience.

name: Paris Loft Hotel
description: Bright, bold, and beautifully urban. A creative space for digital nomads and modern explorers.

name: Gare du Nord Hub
description: Fast access to trains, metros, and airport connections. Perfect for transit travelers and quick city stays.
